This rod can be very useful, as it contains both powerful single-target damage and area damage. It can be a great help in places like the [[Elven Halls|Elf:3]], which contains powerful monsters that aren't resistant to poison. Try not to spam these spells too much though, as their hunger cost is considerable.

==History==
The rod of venom was removed in [[0.14]].
